name: Eslam Hussein
title: CEO & Co-Founder of Invygo
content: Hau is an excellent deliverer who set the great foundation for the app. Will definitely recommend and work with him again in the near future.

name: Nicholas Lim
title: CTO of LittleLives
content: During our interviews, we select candidates who are first and foremost great programmers, way before we find out if they are good at React, Elixir, DevOps etc. Hau is one such developer, he's got great coding conduct and is very current with the developments in the React native, mobile platform specific and javascript space. He is also very professional and an all-round cool guy. Don't hesitate to interview him.

name: Vivek R
title: Director of Crayon Data
content: Hau is an outstanding developer/ architect. He is responsible for building the backbone of our app and has helped us in multiple ways. He is fast, and adheres to good architectural principles.
